result.markdown: --- title: "Week 9: ARIMA models" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Seasonal ARIMA models * Computing forecasts for ARIMA models * ARIMA vs ETS models ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 6-8, 15-16 from [Section 9.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima-exercises.html). ## Exercise solutions ## Pre-seminar activities Read [Sections 9.8-9.10 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Assignments * [GA3](../assignments/G3.qmd) is due on Monday 05 May. * [IA4](../assignments/A4.qmd) is due on Monday 19 May.
